titleStmt.title: A discourse of the most illustrious prince, Henry late Prince of Wales written Anno 1626 / by Sir Charles Cornwallis ...
titleStmt.author: Cornwallis, Charles, Sir, d. 1629.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: J. B. (i.e. John Benson, the publisher)
Inserted at front are three engraved portraits (two mounted) of Prince Henry.
Imperfect: two mounted ports. lacking in film.
Item at UMI reel 89 in : Somers tracts. London : Cadell & Davies, 1809. v. 2, p. 217-225.
Reproduction of original in: Yale University Library; Thomason Collection, British Library.
